group_1.textRight: The entrance exam to St. Liliana Academy?
And that has something to do with making@your restaurant popular again?

group_1.textLeft: ...Okay, you dumb rabbit-thing, let me@explain it to you!
St. Liliana Academy is a historic private@school attended by...
I'm going to get into that school...
And show all those rich girls @how great of a chef I am!
And I'll spread word of our @restaurant to all the rich people!

group_1.textRight: I would guess your chances of getting@into the school are not very good.

group_1.textLeft: Hey! I don't need your negativity,@thank you very much!
...Anyway, you don't have to tell me...

group_1.narration: I think this is our last chance @to save the restaurant.
I want to do everything@I can to make it happen.
Relying on my daughter@to save me... What a pathetic father I am...
It's inexcusable...@Me laying such a burden on you...
But...will you fulfill your father's@first and last selfish wish?

group_1.textLeft: I'd never seen my dad look so weak and@defeated before...
Suddenly, instead of the big, strong @father I'd known since I was a little kid...
I couldn't possibly have said no...

group_1.textRight: when I last saw him, he did not appear@to have gotten any smaller.

group_1.textLeft: You don't get the nuances of words either!@Get lost already!
I need to study like a crazy person to @have any chance at all!
